results.title: Fungi
results.creator_credit: John Walker, William M. Harlow and Encyclopaedia Britannica Films
results.brief_description: Defines fungi as simple plants dependent upon other organism for food. Illustrates how fungi grow and obtain their food. Explains their importance as a source of good, as agents in food processing and as a cause for disease in plants and animals.
results.creator_credit_for_label: John Walker, William M. Harlow and Encyclopaedia Britannica Films
results.description: Defines fungi as simple plants dependent upon other organism for food. Illustrates how fungi grow and obtain their food. Explains their importance as a source of good, as agents in food processing and as a cause for disease in plants and animals.
description_for_label: Defines fungi as simple plants dependent upon other organism for food. Illustrates how fungi grow and obtain their food. Explains their importance as a source of good, as agents in food processing and as a cause for disease in plants and animals.

results.title: Fundamentals of squash: Serves, returns, volleys
results.brief_description: Shows how to position oneself and how to accurately place the ball when serving, returning and volleying.
results.description: Shows how to position oneself and how to accurately place the ball when serving, returning and volleying.

results.title: Fundamentals of squash: Grip, forehand, backhand
results.brief_description: Demonstrates how to grip the racquet in order to facilitate wrist action and how to complete backhand and forehand strokes noting footwork and body position.
results.description: Demonstrates how to grip the racquet in order to facilitate wrist action and how to complete backhand and forehand strokes noting footwork and body position.

results.title: Fundamentals of squash: Basic shots & tactics
results.brief_description: Emphasizes the importance of controlling the centre court position and the awareness of position in relation to one’s opponent. Demonstrates the cross-court angle, corner drop, and lob shots.
results.description: Emphasizes the importance of controlling the centre court position and the awareness of position in relation to one’s opponent. Demonstrates the cross-court angle, corner drop, and lob shots.

results.title: Fundamentals of public speaking
results.brief_description: A lawyer, asked for advice after a student has made a poor platform appearance, explains the basic rules for good public speaking; analyse your subject, audience and purpose; plan your material by selecting, arranging and illustrate your speech in a direct, distinct and lively manner.
results.description: A lawyer, asked for advice after a student has made a poor platform appearance, explains the basic rules for good public speaking; analyse your subject, audience and purpose; plan your material by selecting, arranging and illustrate your speech in a direct, distinct and lively manner.

results.title: Fundamentals of photography: the basic camera
results.brief_description: A simple explanation of how a camera functions showing the working of the various parts including the film holders, the lens and the shutters. A brief history of cameras is traced and the different types of camera are briefly described.
results.description: A simple explanation of how a camera functions showing the working of the various parts including the film holders, the lens and the shutters. A brief history of cameras is traced and the different types of camera are briefly described.

results.title: Fundamentals of photography: light sensitive materials
results.brief_description: This film discusses the physics of light and colour; shows how light-sensitive materials may be classified according to their light sensitivity; explains the composition of such light-sensitive materials.

results.title: Fundamentals of photography: developing the negative
results.brief_description: This film shows the chemistry and procedure in developing still camera film, and explains the composition and function of the developing solution.

results.title: Fundamentals of massage
results.brief_description: Shows proper position of patient for massage; how to perform superficial and deep stroking and the importance of rhythm in stroking; how to knead; how to perform friction; and the value of each type of massage movement. The value of each type of massaging movement are also dealt with.
